[{"idReadable":"P-370","updated":1666090288274,"resolved":null,"summary":"Include PTO in Payment","reporter":{"login":"vdmytruk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

DOD

  • Payments Amount contains PTO corrections
  • PTOs are calculated for the period from 01/01/{currentYear} to the end of the month in a given date
  • PTO corrections are added to the Payment Amount only if the month is December

{"idReadable":"P-402","updated":1666089112178,"resolved":null,"summary":"Generate payments list based on active Staffers","reporter":{"login":"vdmytruk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

DOD:

  • Payments are generated based on active users for now
  • Payments are generated with no relation to users list in spreedsheet
  • New User in the system generates new Payment
  • Archiving of the User on the users service makes it not possible to generate Payment for them

{"idReadable":"P-412","updated":1666084252428,"resolved":null,"summary":"Add fail tolerance edit for Wages List page when someone is missing","reporter":{"login":"ocheban","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

Actual behavior:

when there is no wage for the user (or actually no user), the edit of all other users is failing

Expected behavior:

When someone is missing, the admin is still able to update others' wages

{"idReadable":"P-189","updated":1666082240925,"resolved":null,"summary":"Allow to select date for displayed Payments","reporter":{"login":"vdmytruk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

As Admin, I can change the last date of displayed Payments

DOD:

  1. when the date is changed, numbers in Payments are recalculated immediately in accordance to selected date

dev notes:

  1. selected date is sent on backend -> get Payments between start of date's month and end of date's month ? return them : calculate payments

{"idReadable":"P-333","updated":1666009829888,"resolved":null,"summary":"Add possibility to store Bussines Extras amount","reporter":{"login":"Taras_Kondratiuk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[{"deleted":false,"textPreview":"

Spent 11 points in 54 sprint

","author":{"login":"ykoval","name":"Yulian Koval","$type":"User"},"updated":null,"created":1665136787930,"id":"4-259","$type":"IssueComment"},{"deleted":false,"textPreview":"

already spent 8 points in 55 sprint

","author":{"login":"ykoval","name":"Yulian Koval","$type":"User"},"updated":1666009823349,"created":1666009818244,"id":"4-260","$type":"IssueComment"}],"wikifiedDescription":"

dev:

  • When admin editing Bussines Extras it should be stored in DB
  • The Bussines Extras should has the same created date as Payment in which the Bussines Extras edited
  • When Payment is calculating it should included Bussines Extras amount if exists or default value '0' if not
  • When the admin updates a Busines Extras and the Busines Extras already exits for current payment it should rewrite its value
  • After updating the Business Extras payment should be recalculated
  • Business Extras should has next fields: user_id,created_date_time,amount, comment
  • Edit dialog should be as in Wage fields

DOD

  • "Update from spreadsheet" button doesn't update businessExtras
